snippet: After 35 years in New Jersey, the Nets are a New York team now, and their arrival has spawned a new breed of fan: the Knicks-to-Nets defector.
abstract: Now that Brooklyn Nets are New York team, after 35 years in New Jersey, many New York Knicks fans, disillusioned with that team, are defecting to Nets bandwagon.
lead_paragraph: After 35 years in New Jersey, the Nets are a New York team now, and their arrival has spawned a new breed of fan: the Knicks-to-Nets defector.

headline.seo: Nets Arrival in Brooklyn Spawns New Fan: The Knicks-to-Nets Defector
headline.main: Fans in Brooklyn Have New Shoulder to Cry On
headline.print_headline: Fans in Brooklyn Have New Shoulder to Cry On
